• Together with our clients, we strive to create a safer, smarter world by harnessing the power of deep expertise and advanced technology.

• Prior experience in SoC peripheral interfaces like JTAG, I2C, UART, SPI, ethernet, DDR, PCIe is a plus Document validation progress and results in Rivian’s tracking system, to maintain good traceability Prior experience in camera data processing like MIPI interfaces, ISP, video encoder is a plus Good analytical skills, written and verbal communication skills, and a team player Bachelors Degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering or related field Masters Degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering or related field Prior experience in AMD Zynq FPGA Petalinux development Good knowledge in FPGA design and Verilog languages Use C/C++ software and FPGA technology to validate SoC for the next generation hardware design, enable SoC internal functional blocks and peripheral interfaces.

job_title: Exterior Mechanisms & Glazing - Design Release Engineer
job_description:
• Work with the studio team to provide feedback and generate high quality A-surfaces that meet all DFM requirements while keeping with the theme of the vehicle.
• Work with cross functional teams to develop high quality CAD that meets requirements of the system as a whole and respect clearance zones, sweep zones etc.
• 2-3+ Years of experience developing Side Mirrors, Wipers, Washer Systems, Chargeport Doors, Glazings, and various Automotive mechanisms systems Have demonstrable knowledge of various manufacturing processes such as injection molding, high-pressure die casting and theforming of glass.
• Strong numeracy & literacy with good organizational & communication skills Use Catia V5/3D Experience to develop high quality 3D parametric data to enable faster turnaround to make changes.
• Proven supplier management skills based on working with a mix of build-to-print and full-service suppliers 2+ years of experience in Automotive Exteriors Mechanisms and/or Glazing from concept to production Catia v5 / v6 operative skills, to be able to demonstrate high technical competence Bachelor of Science degree in Mechanical Engineering (Masters preferred).
• Highly motivated with good logical reasoning.

• Your role will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement software applications that meet the needs of our customers.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• You will use your experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
